content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
Fast line, nice servers, great lighting, YUMMY food! This place has the best bossam I've ever eaten. The food is just so delectable even though the price is a little bit much. But I believe the food and the service fits the price so that's why I'm giving it all the stars. The sauces and side dishes included gave the dishes a lot of flavor and we asked for extra bowls and stuff and the staff were very accommodating. Definitely coming back here again if I get the chance!
